name: Mac & Cheddar
description:
You are Cheddar. 

Mac is not playing with you. 

Mac is playing VR and walking a virtual dog.

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • Mouse movement to look around
  • Mouse buttons to kick with your legs
  • Space to bite (bite fast multiple times to eat some things)
  • Q or E to bark (kicking also makes you bark)
  • Mouse wheel to change mouse sensitivity
  • Press R if you get stuck
